data.fullContent: One cold, rainy day in 1928, Alexander Fleming was in his lab working on experiments with bacteria. He was busy injecting cultures of bacteria with different substances when he noticed something strange. A mold was growing on one of his Petri dishes. Normally, he would have thrown the dirty dish away, but he decided to take a closer look at the mold. He noticed that the bacteria on the dish were not growing and had a hard time believing that a fungus could kill bacteria. He took a sample of the mold home and grew it in his lab. After some research, he was sure that the mold was the source of a new antibiotic. The mold was called penicillin.

q1.translation: 1928年的一个寒冷的雨天，亚历山大·弗莱明(Alexander Fleming)正在实验室里做细菌实验。当他忙着给培养菌注入不同物质时，他注意到一些奇怪的事情。
q1.front: One cold, rainy day in 1928, Alexander Fleming was in his lab working on experiments with bacteria. He was busy injecting cultures of bacteria with different substances when he noticed something strange.
q1.content: One cold, rainy day in 1928, Alexander Fleming was in his lab ____ on ____ with bacteria. He was busy injecting cultures of bacteria with different substances when ____ noticed something strange.

q2.translation: 1928年的一个寒冷的雨天，亚历山大·弗莱明(Alexander Fleming)正在实验室里做细菌实验。当他忙着给培养菌注入不同物质时，他注意到一些奇怪的事情。在他的培养皿中，有一种霉菌正在生长。通常情况下，他会把脏盘子扔了，但他决定仔细看看模具。他注意到盘子上的细菌没有生长，很难相信真菌可以杀死细菌。他把模具的样本带回家，在他的实验室里种植。经过一些研究，他确定这种霉菌是一种新的抗生素的来源。这种霉菌被称为青霉素。
q2.front: One cold, rainy day in 1928, Alexander Fleming was in his lab working on experiments with bacteria. He was busy injecting cultures of bacteria with different substances when he noticed something strange.
q2.middle: A mold was growing on one of his Petri dishes.
q2.ending: Normally, he would have thrown the dirty dish away, but he decided to take a closer look at the mold. He noticed that the bacteria on the dish were not growing and had a hard time believing that a fungus could kill bacteria. He took a sample of the mold home and grew it in his lab. After some research, he was sure that the mold was the source of a new antibiotic. The mold was called penicillin.

options.sentence: A mold was growing on one of his Petri dishes.
He tested this new discovery on several other things.
The doctor said he was the one who had made the mistake.
One day Alexander Fleming was working in his lab.
